import React, { useState } from 'react' import Layout from '../../components/Layout/Layout' import toast from "react-hot-toast"; const Register = () => { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(""); const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); // form function const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); toast.success("Registered successfully"); } return (

REGISTRATION FORM

setName(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail1" placeholder="Enter Your Name" required autoFocus />
setEmail(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail1" placeholder="Enter Your Email " required />
setPassword(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="exampleInputPassword1" placeholder="Enter Your Password" required />
setPhone(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail1" placeholder="Enter Your Phone" required />
setAddress(e.target.value)} className="form-control" id="exampleInputEmail1" placeholder="Enter Your Address" required />
) } export default Register
